// <auto-generated />

using Oxygen.Editor.Data;
using Oxygen.Editor.Data.Settings;
using System;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;

#nullable enable

namespace Testing;
public sealed partial class DisplaySettings
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Setting descriptors for DisplaySettings properties.
    /// </summary>
    internal static class Descriptors
    {
        public static readonly SettingDescriptor<string> Name = new()
        {
            Key = new SettingKey<string>(ModuleName, nameof(Name)),
            DisplayName = @"MyName",
            Description = @"Some description",
            Category = @"UserCategory",
            Validators = new ValidationAttribute[] { new StringLengthAttribute(10) { MinimumLength = 1 }, new RangeAttribute(1, 5) },
        };
    }
}

/// <summary>
/// Module initializer that registers DisplaySettings descriptors on assembly load.
/// </summary>
file static class DisplaySettingsInitializer
{
    [System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ModuleInitializer]
    internal static void Initialize()
    {
        EditorSettingsManager.StaticProvider.Register(DisplaySettings.Descriptors.Name);
    }
}
